fn.p: Kathrin Näpflin performed the experiments, analyzed the data, prepared figures and/or tables, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft.
Emily A. O’Connor, Sara K. Lindén and Allison J. Shultz performed the experiments, prepared figures and/or tables, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft.

Lutz Becks, Staffan Bensch, Vincenzo A. Ellis, Nina Hafer-Hahmann, Karin C. Harding, Morten T. Olsen, Jacob Roved, Timothy B. Sackton, Vignesh Venkatakrishnan, Elin Videvall, Helena Westerdahl and Jamie C. Winternitz performed the experiments, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft.
Scott V. Edwards conceived and designed the experiments, performed the experiments, prepared figures and/or tables, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft.
